feed.title: Allow cross-site requests of payment requests

entry.title: Allow cross-site requests of payment requests
entry.summary: The discussion is about amending BIP 70 to suggest including a "Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *" response header for payment request responses. The header exists to prevent security holes arising from mobile code fetching random web resources. Implementing the payment protocol in browser-sandboxed JavaScript may not be popular, therefore, it is unclear how useful this suggestion would be.
